name: File-Sharing
description: Telegram Bot to Share any Telegram Media.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

TRACK_CHANNEL.description: Create new private/public channel and get it's id, startswith -100

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: Enter the username of your channel without @ or http link

OWNER_ID.description: If all: will working for all users (storing files) or fill with your telegram id so that only you can store the files.
